name: Wing 4 CMs
description:
> *The bloodstone explosion unearthed a portal to a place where few have beenâ€”and none have escaped. Deconstruct the mysteries and learn the true story of one of history's most misunderstood figures.*

This is a **Challenge Mode** run of Bastion of the Penitent, i.e. Wing 4. We will have the following encounters:
<:cairn:703930782003101758> **Cairn CM** - An easy but chaotic boss that favours condi DPS. The CM introduces **forced special action key movement**.
<:mursaat:703930783680954459> **Mursaat Overseer CM** - A medium difficulty encounter that favours any high-benching DPS class. The CM introduces the **blue tiles** mechanic.
<:samarog:703930783257329714> **Samarog CM** - A difficult, CC-heavy boss where any kind of DPS works. The CM introduces **many persisting spears in the arena**.
<:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos CM** - A difficult, punishing boss where any kind of DPS works. The CM introduces the **exclusion of Saul D'Alessio's aid**.

Both power and condi DPS work for these encounters!

<:quick_healer:1176639812900495400> <:alac_healer:1176639815282856017> **Healer Roles:**
- One healer will need to **Tank** on <:mursaat:703930783680954459> **Mursaat Overseer CM** (Claim) and <:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos CM**. Tanking for the latter boss is toughness-based, so you're expected to take some toughness via gear such as `Minstrel's` or `Giver's` to take aggro.

<:quick_generic:1176639827890937986> <:alac_generic:1176639824292220958> **Boon Roles:**
- Two quickness/alacrity providers must take the **Stability** role to provide regular <:stability:844163847161774121> **Stability** to the group during <:samarog:703930783257329714> **Samarog CM**.
- Two quickness/alacrity providers must take the **Aegis** role to provide <:aegis:766683009309999104> **Aegis** to the group during <:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos CM**.

<:dps:1176639819191951390> **DPS Roles:**
- One DPS player will need to take the **Handkiter** role. They will play DPS for the first three bosses and swap to a specialised build to do the `Hand Kiting` mechanic on <:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos CM**. This is a role that requires a lot of survivability and I recommend bringing some toughness trinkets. This role is a bit tougher on CM.

Let me know if you have any questions!
templateOverview: This template for a Wing 4 CMs run has **Stability** and **Aegis** roles for <:samarog:703930783257329714> **Samarog CM** and <:deimos:703930783257067551> **Deimos CM** respectively, alongside the standard Wing 4 special roles.
